Summary

Seasoned product manager and technical writer with experience in the GRC, prototyping & collaboration, and test & measurement spaces. Versatile, customer-focused agilist who excels at communicating with stakeholders, capturing and prioritizing requirements, balancing priorities, creating and refining effective processes, and generating content from scratch.

Experience

Product Manager | Technical Writer

October 2018 - present
Independent contractor, Portland, OR

Independent contractor providing product management and writing services for several software projects including a SaaS e-Learning platform.

  • Researched and prioritized product requirements.
  • Wrote detailed requirements documents, user stories, and acceptance criteria.
  • Created high-res mockups to help guide designers and developers.
  • Wrote PRDs, website copy, and user assistance.

Senior Product Manager

June 2014 - July 2018
RADAR, Portland, OR

Product manager for RADAR; a SaaS incident response platform for privacy professionals.

  • Owned the product roadmap and managed the product backlog.
  • Wrote detailed PRDs, user stories, and acceptance criteria.
  • Drove the UI and UX effort via application mockups and prototypes.
  • Communicated product status and managed stakeholder expectations via daily standups, customer check-ins, cross-functional team meetings, and Slack.
  • Served as a key resource to help resolve complex customer-reported issues.
  • Wrote knowledge base articles, release notes, and customer emails.
  • Created and delivered product training for customers and sales staff.
  • Led biannual customer advisory group meeting.
  • Listed as inventor on US patents 9,781,147 and 10,331,904.

Co-founder

April 2012 - June 2014
Southwood Labs, Portland, OR

Product manager for Harness; a SaaS automated testing tool for developers.

  • Researched and prioritized product requirements.
  • Led the customer development process.
  • Created key deliverables including competitor research, lean canvas business model, product positioning brief, web site copy, and application mockups.

Senior Product Manager

Monsoon Commerce, Portland, OR

Product manager for Monsoon; an e-commerce platform for third-party sellers.

  • Researched and prioritized product requirements.
  • Managed stakeholder expectations around feature scope and delivery timelines.
  • Wrote product positioning briefs.
  • Managed beta program.

Senior Product Manager | Technical Writer

Site 9, Portland, OR

Product manager and technical writer for ProtoShare; a SaaS prototyping and collaboration tool for designers and developers.

  • Wrote first-generation online help system and designed in-app user assistance.

Principle Technical Writer

July 1997 - April 2003
The MathWorks, Natick, MA

Technical writer for software products built on MATLAB; a technical computing platform for scientists and engineers.

  • Wrote first-generation documentation for test & measurement (TM), math, and control design products.
  • Researched, wrote, and maintained functional specifications for TM and math products.
  • Designed and created context-sensitive UI help for TM and math products.
  • Planned, authored, and tested customer training course for TM products.
  • Created video tutorials for control design and math products.
  • Led documentation and product usability testing.
